end00.title: Bankruptcy
end00.conclusion: I'm too old for this job, Frank was right the newspaper can't continue...

06-02-1933.title: A gangster story
06-02-1933.monologue: This is the story of me working in the democracy times as the main Editor.

13-02-1933.title: The package
13-02-1933.monologue:
Today I found a package in my desk with a note attached to it, a little present from Andy.
Some dollars in exchange to change our message about his business...

so does he really thinks that we have a price that he can pay?

16-02-1933.title: The call
16-02-1933.monologue:
Frank just call me some moments ago...

Yesterday during a night speech by the elect president, a man fired five shots with a handgun.
He killed Mr Roosevelt...

20-02-1933.title: The punishement
20-02-1933.monologue:
Two days ago Jhonatan was beaten by the Montana's bullies outside of his home, he found a way to arrive to the hospital.

I visited him yesterday, he looks like shit but the doctors and nurses were taking care of him and he will recover.

When I tried to pay the costs of the hospital I discovered that all the bills were already paid...
by Andy Montana.

13-03-1933.title: The Agent
13-03-1933.monologue:
Jhonatan is still at the hospital, he will recover soon. "I want to go back to work, to unmask this criminals once for all" he said.

When I was entering to the building a man identified as "Agent Evans" stoped me at the frontdoor, he wants to talk with me about this Montana issue.

I don't know if we can trust this man.
13-03-1933.comment: en esta las noticias deben cambiar dependiendo de lo que se discuta

20-03-1933.title: Sabotage
20-03-1933.monologue:
Jhonatan will be leaving the hospital in a few days, I'm worried about his safety and this Mr Evans is not going to make the thing easy for us...

"There is a woman waiting for you in the office" said Betty.
 That's Charlie...

10-04-1933.title: The Witness
10-04-1933.monologue:
I haven't received any news from Charlie after her last visit.
They are planning to attack us by sure, but with the BOI close to us guarding our ass will be difficult to them.

Instead I got a letter from "Phil Romano" another "business man", he pledges to have a willing witness who can testify against Tony Montana about his crimes.

Yeah, this collaboration is only a manner to put away his competition but we can finish with Tony and Charlie once and for all

In the other hand this could be a trap they prepare to mislead us...

Who knows?

17-04-1933.title: The Murder
17-04-1933.monologue:
On Wednesday the 20th at 8:00 PM Jhonatan arrived to "My loved venecia" a popular restaurant on the italian neighborhood as scheduled, It was Mr Romano indeed the person that waited for him as we can confirm after the police lifted the bodies from the ground.

They said that it was a retaliation between gangsters, but that's only half the story...

Tony knew that Jhonatan will meet Phil in that restaurant at that fucking same time...
Somebody at the office works for Tony...

end01.title: Justice
end01.conclusion:
The agent Evans and me worked together and finally we talked with the witness.
He was the Montana's business accountant, he modified a lot of documents in order to hide the money from the federals.
 He decided to run away when people used to work for them began to disappear.

He could testify and finally Tony Montana, Charlie and all his partners were convicted...

You can finally rest in peace Jhonatan.

end02.title: Traitor
end02.conclusion:
I went out around 3AM as usual, the cold was insufferable, indeed, was it more painful than surprising.
Perhaps I mistook the cold of the night with the cold of the dagger that pierced me to the hearth.

I failed to Frank, to Jhonatan, to the city...
I'm so Sorry...

end03.title: Leaving out
end03.conclusion:
The Agent Evans was assesinated during a shooting between gangsters, Phil killed him.

"You have one opportunity to collaborate with us and you decide to expose our business? Nobody in this city could protect your ass, it's time to leave if you want to live." he said.

We closed the newspaper operations until further notice, there is nothing more we can do here.

This country is doomed to the hell.

27-03-1933.title: Confrontation
27-03-1933.monologue:
I know that it wasn't correct, but it's ok to blame a man for try to survive?
This people is dangerous and they won't hesitate to kill us if we'll confront them...

This morning Jhonatan confront me for publish that note:
 - "What have you done? You know that story was bullshit." he said.

I couldn't answer him, he almost get killed and even so... he want to go after them.
Is a brave man indeed, but he will endanger us all.

end04.title: Mafia business
end04.conclusion:
We didn't heard about Jhonatan anymore, he be wipped from the map...

Tony offers so much money to Frank for the newspaper that he couldn't resist to it. Now I'm just another employee at the service of Mr Montana...

24-04-1933.title: Quiting
24-04-1933.monologue:
Jhonatan quited, he knows that Charlie knows about his investigations.
I'm sure that he and the agent Evans are working together.

                                                        Am I a coward?

end05.title: Coward
end05.conclusion:
At the end I haven't the guts to afront them, the fear seized me.

Yes I am a coward, I talked with Frank and I leave the office forever.

There is no country for old men like me.

end06.title: They control everything
end06.conclusion:
I was in that restaurant drinking a soda after a week of hard work, thinking that maybe I'm not a coward after all.

Then a man sat next to me. "I'm the detective Mallone" he said."You are doing well informing the people about this gangster problems." then he pierced his eyes on me and said: "Leave the things like this Mr Brown, they control everything, everything..."

end07.title: Look away
end07.conclusion:
When Jhonatan returned, he was upset at me "Why aren't you publishing the articles about Montana?"

He knows that I preffer to leave that topic away from the newspaper for the safe.

In this times it's better to keep silence and talk about another things. We are running a business here.

Jhonatan leaves the newspaper and start working for another diary...

end11.title: Keep in silence
end11.conclusion:
I understand the message, it was clear for me that there is no way to get well of this.
 They control the police, they have the money, the guns and the power to silence anyone that faces them...

Is better to focus on more popular things, at the end that is the way to driving sales...
